QuestData.Title: Victory, For Now
QuestData.Description: The Alliance are victorious, and our forces are still strong. Military strategy dictates that we attack the Forsaken now, while they are recovering and unaware. I made a deal, however...$b$bWe will wait. We attack Koltira and his troops when the time is right. In the meantime, speak with Ginny Goodwin and take a flight to the Chillwind Camp, to our south. Commander Ashlam Valorfist will give you your next assignment.$b$bYou will hear from me when you are needed again in Andorhal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: Word arrived shortly before you did, $n. With the Scourge ejected from Andorhal, we are one step closer to retaking Lordaeron.
